description: This file is an HTML document that serves as the front-end UI for a database visualizer application. It provides a user interface to browse available databases, view tables, and display table data in a structured, scrollable, and interactive manner.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar menu.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by reloading from server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates the HTML for the data table based on provided data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cell, handling different data types and large content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better readability.
